htmlContent:
If this card is a headline, it is valued above any other card and has the text “discard the USSR headline.”

If this card is played by USSR in an action round, it has the text “award USA 1 VP.”
name: Defectors
plainContent:
If this card is a headline, it is valued above any other card and has the text “discard the USSR headline.”
If this card is played by USSR in an action round, it has the text “award USA 1 VP.”
